channel.title: The General's Show Off Thread
channel.description:

Hazmat Character.

[img]https://img25.imageshack.us/img25/549/hazmat2.jpg[/img]
I made the head model through another piece of software that uses sliders to create facial features.

Why would you make a model of yourself?

Read full topic

item.title: The General's Show Off Thread
item.dc:creator: Grand_General_Hot
item.description:
Mangled*:

You have to texture the models because an untextured model is an unfinished model, modelling is only a segment in the process of creating a finished model, texturing (or skinning) is equally important, as is animating if that’s necessary.

I don’t care if they’re finished or not, they’re not going to be worked on any further after, do you think I’m looking for your approval for something? then your sadly mistaken.

Anyway if you think we don’t give a flying fuck about you texturing the salon props then why do you think we give a flying fuck enough to make the thread in the first place?

Because I feel’d like it, got a problem with that?

Why can you show the models but not the textured models? Is it because you didn’t texture them? I think so.

Well no shit Sherlock, I said they weren’t being textured by me in this thread, or was it the thread before the forum collapsed?

It’s one of the advantages of having a texture artist on a development team, and I CAN texture and UV unwrap, I just choose not to because I can’t be bothered too.

Proof right here.

Possible the 2nd worst model character I’ve done.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lrFSnzGEpXw

Anyway the first rule is if you’re going to show off anything, expect and accept criticism, and if you refuse to learn from criticism then you’ll never progress in life.

Hahahahahahhahahahhaha! Yeah sure, snickers

Read full topic

item.title: The General's Show Off Thread
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
Grand_General_Hot:

So I take it your calling me a racist?

No, I’m saying you suck so much at modeling that your models can be considered racist, even if that wasn’t the intention.
Then again, I couldn’t do any better, but that’s beside the point.

Read full topic

item.title: The General's Show Off Thread
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Grand_General_Hot:

Bah bah bah bah bah, don’t care, bah bah bah bah.

Also, why do I have to texture the models? Tell me, because I know that no one’s going to give a flying fuck, even all you too wouldn’t give a fuck if I had texture them, so tell me, why should I waste my time with texturing them when all clearly don’t give a flying fuck?

Also the salon models have been textured and are being used in a educational game, if the game would ever be released, I’d show you.

You have to texture the models because an untextured model is an unfinished model, modelling is only a segment in the process of creating a finished model, texturing (or skinning) is equally important, as is animating if that’s necessary.

It’s like laying the foundations and bare structure of a house you’re building for your family and then walking away because you’re ignorantly content with having an unfinished house when you could learn to install plumbing and electric circuits, light fittings, plaster the walls etc.

Anyway if you think we don’t give a flying fuck about you texturing the salon props then why do you think we give a flying fuck enough to make the thread in the first place?

Why can you show the models but not the textured models? Is it because you didn’t texture them? I think so.

Anyway the first rule is if you’re going to show off anything, expect and accept criticism, and if you refuse to learn from criticism then you’ll never progress in life.

Read full topic

Grand_General_Hot:

Yes, I licked fanny too if you’d like to know, I also fuck a woman too, even preformed anal sex to her, would you like to know more Paddy? would you like to know that I wanked in her mouth too?

Would you even like me to post pictures, I’ve got those too :meh:

You’ve got a big mouth Paddy.

You know, that all could have been reduced to a simple ‘yes’. None of us really care how far you’ve gone with a girl. :fffuuu:

item.title: The General's Show Off Thread
item.dc:creator: Grand_General_Hot
item.description:
P-Thunder.:

So much win/fail in this thread. I read it and cant help but think:

Have you ever kissed a girl?

Yes, I licked fanny too if you’d like to know, I also fuck a woman too, even preformed anal sex to her, would you like to know more Paddy? would you like to know that I wanked in her mouth too?

Would you even like me to post pictures, I’ve got those too :meh:

You’ve got a big mouth Paddy.

This is all very unimpressive I have to say. The salon models are still the only decent thing here, and yet they remain unfinished without any texture work.

You still need a lot of practice and have a lot learning to do, particularly with your human-like models which seem to lack any reference or restraint of realism, perhaps that was the look you were going for… but I can tell you have some trouble discerning proportion and depth on facial features.

Someone once said “amateurs will only ever impress other amateurs”… in fact, I think that someone was me.

Bah bah bah bah bah, don’t care, bah bah bah bah.

Also, why do I have to texture the models? Tell me, because I know that no one’s going to give a flying fuck, even all you too wouldn’t give a fuck if I had texture them, so tell me, why should I waste my time with texturing them when all clearly don’t give a flying fuck?

Also the salon models have been textured and are being used in a educational game, if the game would ever be released, I’d show you.

Read full topic

item.description:
This is all very unimpressive I have to say. The salon models are still the only decent thing here, and yet they remain unfinished without any texture work.

You still need a lot of practice and have a lot learning to do, particularly with your human-like models which seem to lack any reference or restraint of realism, perhaps that was the look you were going for… but I can tell you have some trouble discerning proportion and depth on facial features.

Someone once said “amateurs will only ever impress other amateurs”… in fact, I think that someone was me.
